name: Rewind-Spectra
description:
You are in deep waters and you are lost. You cant see, there is no light down here... You have lost colors and need to get them back. This process is called REWIND-SPECTRA.

"Hey my lantern! A cave? Im drowning i need to get there now!" - Finds a cave in the most deep a human has ever reached. "Could there be something here" Turns on his Lantern... "What is wrong with my eyes... im seeing in black and white ?! My eyes! Am I going blind?! Its the pressure... I need to get out of here"

You have only a lantern and only see in 2 colors at first, Black and White. Your objective is to get your senses back and explore the cave. Who knows what you will find. You will get your senses back by finding beautiful objects, and when you do, something new is waiting for you...
